version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: Optimized MPC Layout, Smart Scaling, UI Cleanup

reapack.name: floop-ess-hunter.lua
reapack.desc: Floop Ess Hunter: tame hiss and sibilance with envelopes.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v1.1.0 - Added support for split clips and items not starting at 0. - Introduced interactive handles for manual segment adjustment. - Added per-segment volume control via vertical drag. - Fixed waveform display alignment for offset items. - "Analyze and Apply" now correctly handles item offsets and playrates. - "Close" button in title bar now matches standard close behavior.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: - Improved envelope visibility and stability when applying from preview. - Added segment gain handles with live update when Live Edit is enabled. - Hardened analysis and preview via median clamp on extreme sibilant material.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: + Fixed: Notes lost when saving a previously unsaved project. + Fixed: JSFX reader disappearing on font scale changes. + Fixed: Race condition when switching project tabs. + Improved: Numeric display for Font Scale slider. + Internal: Improved project path detection.

reapack.name: floop-search.lua
reapack.desc: Floop Search: fast track navigation and search tool

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: Initial release. Track search, selection, and previewing. Animated floating UI with debounced search.

reapack.name: floop-sheet-reader.lua
reapack.desc: Floop Sheet Reader: load and view PDF and image files.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v2.1 - Added About/Credits section with Poppler attribution. - Restored Clear Cache button. - Fixed tooltip contrast.

reapack.name: floop-studio-trainer.lua
reapack.desc: Floop Studio Trainer: practice your instrument inside Reaper.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v1.2 (2026-02-05) - Fix: Solved crash with fractional Project BPM values.

reapack.name: floop-useless-time-based-effects-calculator.lua
reapack.desc: Floop Useless Time-Based Effects Calculator: time-based FX helper.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v1.1 (2025-01-09) + Live calculation (removed Calculate buttons). + Added unit toggle (ms / seconds). + Improved UI layout and theme.

reapack.name: floopa-station.lua
reapack.desc: Floopa Station: five-track live looping station.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v1.1 - Idempotent 5-track creation. - Precise loop alignment with independent thresholds. - Robust setup/revert with full settings restore. - GUID-based MIDI control track management. - Docking support enabled.

version.author: Floop-s
version.changelog: v1.1.1 - Auto-Loop length and recording position fixed (timeline-agnostic behavior).
